function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of physical activity","Impact":"Decreased physical fitness, increased risk of chronic diseases, and lowered overall well-being","Mitigation":"Encouraging and promoting regular physical activity through education, community programs, and accessible exercise facilities","Technologies":"Fitness and health tracking devices, mobile apps for exercise guidance, virtual fitness classes","People":"General population, individuals with sedentary lifestyles","Owner":"Health organizations, local governments, fitness industry"},{"Description":"Sedentary lifestyle","Impact":"Increased risk of obesity, cardiovascular diseases, diabetes, and mental health disorders","Mitigation":"Implementing workplace wellness programs, promoting active transportation, and providing ergonomic workstations","Technologies":"Standing desks, ergonomic chairs, activity trackers, wellness apps","People":"Office workers, individuals with desk jobs, students","Owner":"Employers, educational institutions, health professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of leisure time physical activity","Impact":"Missed opportunity for supplementary health benefits, decreased overall well-being","Mitigation":"Promoting and providing access to leisure time physical activities such as dancing, yoga, and other recreational activities","Technologies":"Virtual dance classes, yoga apps, community recreational programs","People":"General population, individuals with limited leisure time, elderly individuals","Owner":"Community organizations, fitness industry, local governments"}]}
